title: Losing India’s Guardian Angels
description:
USAID funding supported efforts to eradicate tuberculosis in India, one of the country’s deadliest diseases. Now, that money and support is gone.
The post Losing India’s Guardian Angels appeared first on The American Prospect.
content: BIHAR, INDIA Sitting outside his modest house in Indias eastern state of Bihar, Sudeshwar Singh, 48, scrolls on his smartphone through the recent Global Tuberculosis Report released by the World Heal… [+11820 chars]
